Dark One/Hiss/Nemesis Enforcer:

"Can we even trust them?" (Enforcer whispers so only Zardus can hear)

"Very well." (Dark One says, smiling at the sound of a good fight)

::Hiss yells:: "What about our payement?  Do these fools even have anything 
of value?!"

"You are right Hiss.  I'm afraid before you gain our services we need to work 
out what our payment will be."
